svg.title: Testing that href changes are live
svg.script: function startTest() { document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); // in case we're not gecko setTimeout(doTest, 5000); } function doTest() { document.getElementById("r1").setAttributeNS("http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink", "href", "#r2"); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
